name: WYVERN

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wyvern makes one Bite attack and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the wyvern's next turn.
